mdRecord.dcterms:title: Spottsylvania Court House [1864] / from surveys under the direction of Bvt. Brig. Gen. N. Michler, Maj. of Engineers, by command of Bvt. Maj. Genl. A.A. Humphreys, Brig. Genl. & Chief of Engineers, 1867 ; surveyed & drawn by Maj. J.E. Weyss, assisted by F. Theilkuhl, J. Strasser, & G. Thompson ; photolith. by the N.Y. Lithographing, Engraving & Printing Co., Julius Bien, Supt
Spotsylvania Court House
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bien, Julius, 1826-1909
Michler, N. (Nathaniel), 1827-1881
N.Y. Lith. & Eng. Co.
Weyss, J. E.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.
Shows location of Union and Confederate forces and names of some rural landowners.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 2: Fragile, with some torn edges.
